Package org.simplecorporation.myengine.core.input

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Input
    The Input class is a class composed of static fields and methods used to store InputListener's and call events from within them
    InputManager
    The InputManager class is used to manage input both on PC and on Android.
    InputManagerAndroid
    The InputManagerAndroid class is used to manage input on Android
    InputManagerJava
    The InputManagerjava class is used to manage input on PC using pure Java
    InputManagerLWJGL
    The InputManagerLWJGL class is used to manage input for LWJGL
    KeyboardInput
    The KeyboardInput class that contains all of the key codes for the keyboard used by MyEngine when calling events and also holds boolean values for each key that can be statically accessed which are equal to true when that key is currently pressed (Down).
    MouseInput
    The MouseInput class contains information about the current status of the Mouse
